alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 01 at 7:10PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding and debris flows on area burn scars caused by excessive rainfall remains possible. * WHERE...A portion of Utah, including the following areas, Central Mountains, Eastern Juab/Millard Counties, Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs, Tooele and Rush Valleys, Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 and Western Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...Until Midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Burn scars across central Utah may experience flash flooding or debris flows. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Showers and thunderstorms capable of producing heavy rainfall will persist through this evening. Area burn scars remain sensitive to heavy rain and susceptible to flash flooding and debris flows. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Mountains
